name: Button
description: The Button component offers a set of predefined styles for actions in forms, dialogs, and more. It supports multiple visual variants (`default`, `secondary`, `tertiary`, `ghost`, `glass`), sizes (`sm`, `md`, `lg`, `icon`), and standard button attributes. The component is built with `class-variance-authority` for easy customization. Example: `<Button variant="secondary" size="lg">Click Me</Button>`
